directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook beef and onion until beef is brown.  Stir in chili seasoning and water.
Pour beef mixture into a slow cooker and stir in tomato paste, chili beans, baked beans, tomato soup and diced tomatoes with green chiles.  Cook on low 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
title: Swink's Chili
